reviews.snippet:
Recently opened restaurant near JR Shinbashi station that offers delicious halal beef, making it a great option for Muslims seeking authentic Halal cuisine. The ambience is warm and inviting, perfectly located in the bustling district of Shinbashi. I highly recommend this spot for anyone looking to enjoy quality food in a pleasant setting.
They have our favourite Teh Botol Sosro also!

extracted_snippet.original:

The ambience is warm and inviting, perfectly located in the bustling district of Shinbashi. I highly recommend this spot for anyone looking to enjoy quality food in a pleasant setting.
They have our favourite Teh Botol Sosro also!

response.snippet: Your kind words about our restaurant bring us joy! It's fantastic to know that you enjoyed the halal beef and found the location convenient. We're also pleased you like the Teh Botol Sosro. Looking forward to your next visit!

reviews.snippet: サムライ焼肉ステーキを注文しました。美味しかったです。肉は柔らかくて、セットに出てきた肉寿司も美味しかったです。スタッフは優しい外国人で、とても感じの良い方でした。東京にハラールの肉が食べたい方に強くおすすめします。また来たいと思います。

extracted_snippet.original: サムライ焼肉ステーキを注文しました。美味しかったです。肉は柔らかくて、セットに出てきた肉寿司も美味しかったです。スタッフは優しい外国人で、とても感じの良い方でした。東京にハラールの肉が食べたい方に強くおすすめします。また来たいと思います。
extracted_snippet.translated: I ordered the Samurai Yakiniku Steak. It was delicious. The meat was tender, and the meat sushi that came with the set was also delicious. The staff were kind and very friendly. I highly recommend this place to anyone wanting to eat halal meat in Tokyo. I would love to come again.

response.snippet: ご来店いただき、誠にありがとうございます。サムライ焼肉ステーキと肉寿司をお楽しみいただけたようで嬉しいです。スタッフにもお褒めの言葉をいただき、ありがとうございます。東京でハラールのお肉をお探しの方にもご満足いただけるよう、これからも努めてまいります。またのご来店を心よりお待ちしております。

extracted_snippet.translated: Thank you very much for visiting us. We are glad that you enjoyed our Samurai Yakiniku Steak and meat sushi. We also appreciate your kind words about our staff. We will continue to strive to satisfy those looking for Halal meat in Tokyo. We look forward to seeing you again.

reviews.snippet:
I ordered Premium Gyu-Katsu Beef Cutlet Set Meal.
I really enjoyed the food here! The 1-seat meal is perfectly portioned for one person, and the price is very reasonable for the quality of the dishes. The ingredients taste fresh, and everything was served nicely and on time.
The staff (Syadza from Indonesia) were also friendly and helpful, which made the whole dining experience even better. I highly recommend this restaurant! 😍

extracted_snippet.original:

reviews.snippet:
五感で味わう贅沢な和牛体験⭐︎

上質な和牛を目の前の鉄板で香ばしく焼き上げる贅沢なひととき⭐︎
お肉は驚くほど柔らかく、旨みが口いっぱいに広がります！
牛寿司や小鉢も一品一品が丁寧で、心尽くしの内容に大満足。落ち着いた空間で、特別な時間を過ごすことができました♡

extracted_snippet.original:

A luxurious wagyu beef experience that savors all five senses⭐︎

Enjoy a luxurious moment as high-quality wagyu beef is grilled to perfection on a hot plate right in front of you⭐︎
The meat is incredibly tender, and the flavor fills your mouth!
The beef sushi and side dishes are all carefully prepared, leaving you feeling completely satisfied. We had a truly special time in a relaxing atmosphere♡

reviews.snippet:
I knew the Gyukatsu is chewier so when I see the gigantic gyukatsu, I was surprised and wasn’t sure if I can finish.

But 200g? I swallowed! That’s that good!
Must try with the oyster sauce and chilly sauce. It’s really tasty 💗

The miso soup and tartar sauce are also detailed!
